verbose_text: With the shift from the conventional rice-wheat-fallow system (Scenario 1) to reduced or CA based rice or maize-wheat-mungbean system (Scenarios 2-4), a win-win situation was observed in all scenarios at the systems level without any trade-offs except at the crop level in Scenario 3 where rice yield declined in Years 4 and 5 (XREF_FIG, XREF_TABLE).
